name: Penne With Tomatoes Basil and Garlic
keywords: basil, penne, tomato, dairy-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, main course, summer
recipeIngredient: 3 to 4 ripe tomatoes, seeded and chopped
1 clove garlic, green part removed, minced
Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the penne in boiling salted water and drain when al dente.
Pour the oil into a large serving bowl and add the penne. Toss and add the tomatoes, basil and garlic. Season to taste with salt and pepper and serve.
